title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Dining Table", 1934–35
inscribed: At top left: Dining table 44 x 66 1/2; at left center (with arrow pointing right): 29 1/2 H./ R. 7 1/2; at center left: Dining; at center: 17' - 11"; at far right: R.; lower right: 24 1/4 / 25 3/4; lower center: 71"/20" 12 1/4"; at lower left: 25 1/4 / 27 1/2; at bottom center: 13' 2 3/4.
description: Floor plan of room on Lady Esther Yacht showing dimensions and placement for large dining table. Room is rounded at top and rectilinear at lower edge. Two doors at lower wall of room, separated by window. Window on each side wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Dining Table", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on cream paper, burned. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-312-12.
